body:
# mooxins: CSS3 mixins for SASS(SCSS)
mooxins generate vendor prefixes for CSS3 properties.

## CSS properies:
* opacity
* border-radius
* box-shadow
* text-shadow
* box-sizing
* background-clip
* text-overflow
* border-image
* transform
* linear-gradient
* radial-gradient
* transition
* transition-property
* transition-duration
* transition-timing-function
* transition-delay

## Also quick two type of gradients:
* gradient-horizontal(startColor, endColor)
* gradient-vertical(startColor, endColor)

## Getting started
1. [Install SASS](http://sass-lang.com/)
2. Import mooxins: `@import 'mooxins';`
3. Include it: `.my-gradient { @include gradient-vertical(#ff00c6, #a90083); }`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Mooxins
